meta.title: PT Fish Modern Success - Premium Seafood Supplier
meta.description: Indonesia's premium seafood supplier and exporter specializing in Frozen Tuna, Red Snapper, Grouper, and various export-quality fish products.

hero.welcome: Welcome to PT Fish Modern Success
hero.description: Your trusted partner for high-quality frozen fish products. Sourced from Indonesian waters, delivered worldwide.

about.label: About Our Company
about.description: Our company was founded in 2025 with the aim of contributing to the development of fish export trade from Indonesia to international markets. Since our inception, we have been committed to providing high-quality, safe fishery products that meet global trade standards.
about.history: In 2026, the company was officially registered and authorized by the government through the General Legal Administration Agency (AHU), as a form of legality and our commitment to conducting business activities professionally, transparently, and in accordance with applicable regulations.
about.focus: The company's main focus is export fish trade, both fresh and frozen, prioritizing product quality, timely delivery, and customer satisfaction.

legal.title: Officially Licensed & Trusted
legal.desc: Registered and authorized by AHU Agency, providing security and trust guarantees for business partners.

quality.title: Focus on Product Quality
quality.desc: Strict raw material selection and product handling according to fishery export standards.

network.title: Strong Supplier Network
network.desc: Direct partnership with local fishermen and suppliers to maintain fish availability and quality.

international.title: International Market Orientation
international.desc: Understanding the needs and standards of the global market in export fish trade.

sustainable.title: Sustainability Commitment
sustainable.desc: Supporting responsible and sustainable fishing practices.

tuna.name: Frozen Tuna
tuna.description: Premium quality frozen tuna. Individually packed and labeled. Ready for international export.

snapper.name: Red Snapper
snapper.description: High-quality red snapper. Perfect for grilling, steaming, and frying. Export quality standard.

grouper.name: Grouper
grouper.description: Fresh grouper with firm meat texture. Highly sought after in Asian markets. Restaurant quality.

parrotfish.name: Parrotfish
parrotfish.description: Colorful parrotfish. Popular in Southeast Asian cuisine. Fresh from Indonesian waters.

mixed.name: Mixed Fresh Fish
mixed.description: Various types of fresh fish. Perfect for distributors and wholesalers. Consistent daily supply.

deepsea.name: Deep Sea Fish
deepsea.description: Deep sea fish with excellent meat quality. Ideal for international markets and processing.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become a trusted and globally competitive company that excels, innovates, and operates professionally in providing quality products—especially in trade and fisheries—sustainably, transparently, and oriented towards
vision.highlight: customer satisfaction and long-term value creation for business partners and the economy

mission.title: Our Mission
items: Provide premium quality fishery products that meet international food safety standards.
Support local fishermen through fair partnerships and sustainable development programs.
Implement responsible fishing methods to preserve marine ecosystems.
Continuously innovate in cold-chain logistics to ensure maximum freshness.

location.title: Our Location
location.address: Jalan Ikan Lumba-Lumba, Mayangan Village, Probolinggo City, East Java Province

certificates.label: Quality Assurance
certificates.title: Official Certifications
certificates.subtitle: We are committed to maintaining the highest quality and food safety standards in all our operations.
certificates.qualityDesc: PT Fish Modern Success holds official certifications demonstrating our commitment to the highest standards in quality control, food safety, and sustainable practices.

govCert.title: Government Certified
govCert.desc: Our facilities are officially registered and certified by Indonesian government authorities, ensuring compliance with national and international standards.

exportReady.title: Export Ready
exportReady.desc: All our products meet international export requirements and are processed at facilities compliant with global food safety protocols.

transparent.title: Transparent Documentation
transparent.desc: We provide complete documentation and certificates for all products, ensuring full traceability and transparency for our business partners.

certificates.additionalNote: Additional certifications (HACCP, Halal, FDA, MSC) are in process. Complete documentation available upon request for registered partners.

gallery.label: Real Products
gallery.title: SEAFOOD PRODUCT GALLERY
gallery.subtitle: These are real photos from our products. What you see is what you get - premium quality seafood products from Indonesian waters.
gallery.note: All photos taken from our actual inventory and processing facilities

tuna.description: Export quality frozen tuna with proper labeling

footer.brandDesc: Leading sustainable seafood exports. Delivering authentic Indonesian archipelago flavors to global markets with the highest quality.
footer.address: Jl. Ikan Lumba-Lumba, Mayangan, Probolinggo, East Java 67218
footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe for market insights and price updates.

assistant.greeting: Hello! I am the PT Fish Modern Success AI Assistant. Ask me about our frozen tuna, shipping logistics, or product availability.
assistant.title: Export Assistant

cta.title: READY TO GROW YOUR SEAFOOD BUSINESS?
cta.description: Partner with Indonesia's most trusted supplier. We ensure consistent supply, premium quality, and competitive prices for your market.
